mapper.select: SELECT t.id , t. NAME , t.url , t.image , t.content , t.`status`,t.create_time FROM t_travels t WHERE t.is_delete = 0
SELECT * from t_user_travels WHERE open_id = #{open_id} AND travels_id = #{travels_id}

SELECT t.* FROM (SELECT a.id as achievement_id, a.`name` as achievement_name, a.type as achievement_type, a.achievement_val, a.integration, COUNT(1) buy_count, (SELECT count(1) FROM t_achievement_relation c WHERE c.achievement_id = a.id) finish_count FROM t_achievement a , t_achievement_relation b WHERE a.id = b.achievement_id AND a.type = 2 AND b.relation_id IN (SELECT e.travels_id from t_user_travels e WHERE e.open_id = 'o_4Mv04j5E7bIsuebW5TKcIoLLFY') AND b.achievement_id NOT in(SELECT f.achievement_id FROM t_user_achievement f WHERE f.open_id = 'o_4Mv04j5E7bIsuebW5TKcIoLLFY') GROUP BY b.achievement_id) t WHERE t.finish_count = t.buy_count
SELECT b.* FROM t_user_travels a , t_travels b WHERE a.travels_id = b.id AND a.open_id = #{open_id}
